item.title: Unsupervised learning
item.description: I will be following the UC Berkeley’s CS294-158 Deep Unsupervised Learning course and sharing my short summaries and takeaways. The course covers Deep Generative Models and Self-supervised Learning with the focus on the theoretical foundations as well as their newly enabled applications. Stay tuned! Topics: Autoregressive Models Lossless Compression Flow Models Latent Variable Models Bits-Back Coding Implicit Models Introduction What is Unsupervised Learning??? It is a type of machine learning algorithm that draws inferences from data which does not have labeled responses, so no direct classification or regression can be done.
